document.text:
U.S. v. 
Ghislaine Maxwell 
• MAXWELL HAS BEEN CHARGED WITH FACILITATING 
THE SEXUAL ABUSE OF UNDERAGED GIRLS BY 
JEFFREY EPSTEIN. 
•  THE CHARGED CONDUCT OCCURRED IN NEW YORK CITY, 
PALM BEACH, FLORIDA, SANTA FE, NEW MEXICO, AND 
LONDON, ENGLAND. 
• IF YOU RECOGNIZE EITHER OF THESE PERSONS AND 
FEEL YOU MAY BE A VICTIM, PLEASE CALL THE 
FOLLOWING NUMBER: 
1-800
-CALL FBI 
EFTA00031903

U.S. v. 
Ghislaine Maxwell 
Properties Owned by Epstein Where Alleged 
Grooming and/or 
Abuse of Minor Victims Occurred: 
New York, New York 
Palm Beach, Florida 
Santa Fe, New Mexico 
EFTA00031904
